text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( int tc = 0 ; tc < t ; tc ++ ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; int c = 0 ; for ( int i = 0 ; i + 1 < n && i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) c ++ ; } printf ( "%d\n" , c + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
